text: Marktschorgast is a municipality in Kulmbach in Bavaria in Germany. ==City arrangement== Marktschorgast is arranged in the following boroughs: * Grundmühle * Marktschorgast * Mittelpöllitz * Oberpöllitz * Pulst * Rohrersreuth * Thalmühle * Unterpöllitz * Ziegenburg ==References== Category:Kulmbach (district)
title: Marktschorgast
